狉字的基本解释

狉
pī
〔狉狉〕形容野兽轰动，如“鹿豕狉狉”。

狉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pī］
［《集韻》攀悲切，平脂，滂。］
(1)兽名。狸猫。
(2)见“狉狉”。

狉字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　狉； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页708第12
【集韻】【韻會】?攀悲切，音?。【集韻】本作豾，貍子也。　又【集韻】貧悲切，音邳。【柳宗元·封建論】草木榛榛，鹿豕狉狉。

暂无。

狉
Basic explanation of words
狉
pī
〔狉狉] Describes the sensation of wild beasts, such as "lu qi 狉狉".
狉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pī］
["Ji Yun" is sad, flat, and peng. ]
(1) The animal name. Civet cat.
(2) See "狉狉".
狉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Part Two] [Dog Character Department] 　狉; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 708 No. 12
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Climbing sadness, sound?. [Ji Yun] This is a pirate, and a raccoon.　[Jiyun] Poor and sad, with sound. [Liu Zongyuan·Feudalism] The vegetation and the hazel, the deer hog.
